String.string: Bamarama: The monster you chose won.
You have an eye for monsters. Good luck with your next event.
Allow me to introduce the blue team!
And now, on the red team...
Let the game begin!
The next Bamarama fight will begin shortly.
I'm your host, Spirun!
{NpcName}'s HP has dropped to 50%.
{NpcName} has only 30% HP!
{NpcName} has only 20% HP!
{NpcName} has only 10% HP!
{NpcName} has only 5% HP! Finish him!
The Bamarama match will begin shortly.
This match is between {NpcName} and {NpcName}.
Betting is now open.
Go to a bookie and select a monster you want.
Betting is in progress.
Betting will close soon, and a match will begin.
Betting has closed. Please take a seat in the grandstand.
Bamarama Diamond Match will begin shortly.
For diamond matches, you can only bet with diamond tickets.
The event has ended.
You'll receive your rewards via parcel post.
Claim your rewards from parcel post.
Remember to claim your rewards.
Come back again for more exciting action.
Thank you for joining us!
Akasha's faithful henchman! The risen dark wings that have murdered countless victims!
A sorcerer with the arms of a warrior!
Mistress of Deceit from the temple of Lok!
The most frightful spider from the Sinestral Manor!
Screams of horror echoing through the Necromancer Tomb!
The bloodthirsty owner of the Golden Labyrinth!
The master manipulator of fire!
The ruler of the skies!
Death bringer of Pora Elinu!
Single-eyed mad man!
Black wings of hatred!
This is not your everyday basilisk we're talking about!
Gigantic tyrant of the forest!
Grim reaper born from hell fire!
The wondrous sharp chin can cut through steel!
What? What is he doing here? Well anyway, Master of Kumasylum!
Which foolish soul is going to challenge me? Hahahaha!
If you want death, I will give you death.
How should I cook you? Huh? Mwahahaha!
I'm starving, and you look delicious!
Bring it on!
I shall see if you're worth letting live.
Burn to ashes in my beautiful fire!
Accept your destiny. I'll let you die in peace.
Burn! Burn to death!
Raarrr! I'll destroy you!
This fight is meaningless.
Hit! Smash! Destroy!
Squeek! RrrK!
Taste the flames of hell!
I'll bite off your head!
You no take candy!
